notes: Seti Astro Suite Pro V1.8.0 Major Update: Cosmic Clarity now incorporated directly into SASpro. No need to separately download Cosmic Clarity. This will also allow much faster Cosmic Clarity code updates via SASpro updates. Be sure to download the CC latest models via Settings->Preferences.  Updated Install GPU Acceleration which now can be found in Setting->Preferences.  Benchmark tool for SASpro now under Settings->Benchmark
